Combine multiple dockerignore objects

Source: R/dockerignore-core.R
c.dockerignore.Rd

Merges patterns from multiple dockerignore objects into a single one. This is useful for combining different template patterns.

Usage

# S3 method for class 'dockerignore'
c(...)

Arguments

...

dockerignore objects to combine

Value

A new dockerignore object with combined patterns from all inputs

See also

dockerignore() for creating a new dockerignore object & dk_template_ignore_common() for adding common patterns

Other dockerignore core functions: check_dockerignore(), dockerignore(), is_dockerignore(), print.dockerignore()

Examples

# Create dockerignore objects with different patterns
di_git <- dk_template_ignore_git()
di_r <- dk_template_ignore_r()

# Combine them
di_combined <- c(di_git, di_r)
